title: AV Technician
desc: Led teams of up to 15 specialists to execute on AV plans for 100+ events with an affinity for being ahead of schedule and achieving high customer satisfaction.

title: Director, Event Technology I
desc: Promoted from Technician to Lead after 3 months, and then to Director a year after that. Obtained a top 10% productivity ranking in 2020 and was recognized with outstanding customer service awards 12 times.
